XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data: <Routes> <Route Url="/pat/all" Method="GET" Call="emr.patient.Service:getAll"/> <Route Url="/pat/:id" Method="GET" Call="emr.patient.Service:getPat"/> <Route Url="/pat/add" Method="POST" Call="emr.patient.Service:addPat"/> <Route Url="/pat/upd/:id" Method="PUT" Call="emr.patient.Service:updPat"/> <Route Url="/pat/del/:id" Method="DELETE" Call="emr.patient.Service:delPat"/> </Routes>
